charges.charge_description: COUNT ONE: On or about May 8, 2019, in the Western District of Missouri, the defendant, GABRIEL ALFREDO ORTEGON-JIMENEZ, did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute a mixture or substance containing a 50 grams or more of methamphetamine, a Schedule I controlled substance, in violation Title 21, United States Code, Sections 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B).
